data.title: Washburn Guitars, Singapore > Grand Auditorium Cedar Top > Grand Auditorium WG Rosewood guitar > RosewoodGloss > Natural
data.meta_description:
A Sweet-sounding Grand Auditorium Rosewood Guitar for a Great Price !

	
	The Washburn Deluxe Grand Auditorium Rosewood acoustic-electric venetian cut-away guitar is a great-looking solid-cedar-topped 6-string acoustic guitar any player can afford. With its Grand Auditorium body style and the combination of a solid cedar top plus rosewood back and sides, the guitar delivers smooth mid-ranges and warm highs to go with its impressive low-end punch. Grand Auditorium guitar is slightly smaller than Dreadnought acoustic guitar shape, it’s powerful sound & smaller shape making it attractive for guitarist who like playing for hours. There's also a Fishman Isys+ electronics system onboard for when you need to plug in onstage. Let your fingers play on the bound maple fingerboard atop the fast satin-finished mahogany neck - you won't want to stop! And with real abalone inlays for the rosette and top’s purfling, you'll get playability, tone, and stunning good looks from this Washburn Grand Auditorium acoustic-electric guitar.

	 

	Washburn Grand Auditorium Rosewood Acoustic Guitar at a Glance:
	• Cedar-topped guitar in Grand Auditorium is a favourite choice & it has excellent sound projection
	• Ready for the stage with exceptional Fishman electronics
	• Washburn - producing fine fretted instruments since 1883

	 

	Cedar-topped guitar has excellent sound projection
	Washburn fitted their Grand Auditorium acoustic guitar with a solid cedar top to give it a warm and extra-sweet sound. Cedar has long been used on rosewood guitars to bring out the natural warmth of the woods and to tame some of the instrument's natural brightness. A rosewood bridge also provides full contact with the cedar top, capturing and transferring the full string vibrations of every note you play on this Grand Auditorium acoustic guitar, giving you absolutely astonishing sustain.

	 

	Ready for the stage with exceptional Fishman electronics
	The Washburn Grand Auditorium Rosewood guitar looks great, sounds great, and plays great, so it's lucky for you that it sports built-in Fishman Isys+ electronics so you can take it on-stage. Fishman is a world-recognized leader in acoustic amplification, and you'll love the clarity and definition you get from this guitar. There's even a built-in tuner, so you'll be able to tune up and play your guitar no matter where you are.

	 

	Washburn - producing fine fretted instruments since 1883
	Registered and started in Chicago dating back the year 1883, Washburn is an American institution in musical instrument manufacturing. From guitars to mandolins, banjos, ukuleles, and more, Washburn has long been a recognized and cherished brand among musicians. Many of the biggest names in folk, blues, and rock 'n' roll have played these well-crafted, quality instruments. Washburn combines quality construction with premium materials to deliver an instrument that's ready to perform on any stage. Contact us to test or find out more about this global guitar brand.

	 

	Washburn Grand Auditorium Rosewood Acoustic Guitar Features:

	
		A comfortable yet impressively loud acoustic-electric guitar with a naturally sweet and smooth tone
	
		Rosewood back and sides topped with solid cedar provide exceptional warmth and tonal balance
	
		Quartersawn scalloped bracing and bone nut and saddle combine to provide excellent sustain and liveliness
	
		Fishman Isys+ onboard electronics provide stellar sound onstage and a built-in tuner
	
		Satin finished mahogany neck with maple bound fingerboard & maple bound body provide a smooth feel
	
		Adorned with an abalone rosette and top purfling plus Washburn branded chrome die cast tuners for an elegant look


	 

	The Key Features

	
		Grand Auditorium with venetian cutaway shape
	
		Solid cedar top
	
		Quarter sawn scalloped bracing
	
		Rosewood sides and back
	
		Gloss finish
	
		Fishman isys+ pick up/ onboard preamp with built in tuner
	
		Mahogany neck with two-way truss rod
	
		Body, neck and headstock are all with maple bound bindings
	
		Rosewood fingerboard, bridge and head’ cap
	
		Bone nut and saddle
	
		Washburn logo & stylized "W" inlay on headstock
	
		Washburn brand embosed on Chrome die-cast tuners
	
		Washburn brand embossed on maple cap on neck hill back
	
		Comes equipped with D'Addario EXP coated strings, light gauges set
	
		Case sold separately but availabe as GCGADLX the Washburn Grand Auditorium original hard case (please ask for it from our sales assistant)


	 

	Washburn Guitars brand is owned by US Music Corp, located in Buffalo Grove, IL. US Music Corp is an international music company that manufactures and distributes products worldwide under Washburn Guitars. US Music Corp is a subsidiary of Jam Industries, Ltd.

	 

	Luthier Guitar Centre is Washburn guitars international distributor based in Singapore. We provide set-up for every guitars before we will display it or before overseas shipping (for on-line purchases). We do our best to ensure our clients received the Washburn guitars in fresh & correct condition. You can buy it online at
	www.luthierguitar.com
data.text: Est. Weight incl packing (Kg) 3 kg with no case
